name: Dungeon Roller (Silinaly)
description:
In Dungeon Roller, every level is a dungeon to defeat. Roll the die before entering the dungeon to know what fate awaits for you inside. If you manage to exit the dungeon, you may choose to enter a new one. How many dungeons will you be able to defeat? Be careful, they only become more difficult.

This game was made during the GTMK Jam 2022.
